channel.title: All Registered Polls for the Folketinget
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the Folketinget

item.title: Opinion Poll by Voxmeter for Ritzau, 26 August–1 September 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Socialdemokraterne: 24.1–29.4%
  • Dansk Folkeparti: 6.4–9.7%
  • Venstre: 21.0–26.1%
  • Enhedslisten–De Rød-Grønne: 5.4–8.5%
  • Liberal Alliance: 1.8–3.8%
  • Alternativet: 1.4–3.2%
  • Radikale Venstre: 7.7–11.2%
  • Socialistisk Folkeparti: 7.6–11.2%
  • Det Konservative Folkeparti: 5.5–8.6%
  • Kristendemokraterne: 0.9–2.3%
  • Nye Borgerlige: 1.2–2.9%
  • Stram Kurs: 0.7–2.0%
